code:
import ajax from'./ajax';// export function rerRegister() {}
/* 端口号不同，存在跨域
*  解决：1.json,只能解决get； 2. cross 服务器端配置；
*       3.代理（代理服务器，存在于客户端，帮助转发请求）
*  */ //regi api
export var reqRegister=function reqRegister(user){return ajax('/register',user,'POST');};//login api
export var reqLogin=function reqLogin(_ref){var username=_ref.username,password=_ref.password;return ajax('/login',{username:username,password:password},'POST');};//updating user asyn action
export var reqUpdateUser=function reqUpdateUser(user){return ajax('/update',user,'POST');};// getting userinfo asyn action
export var reqUser=function reqUser(){return ajax('/user');};// getting userlist
export var reqUserList=function reqUserList(type){return ajax('/userlist',{type:type});};// getting current user message list
export var reqChatMsgList=function reqChatMsgList(){return ajax('/msglist');};// change msg read to read = true
export var reqReadMsg=function reqReadMsg(from){return ajax('/readmsg',{from:from},'POST');};
